title: BLACK SCREEN OF DEATH lol
body:
so. basically as a few people have noticed. as u accept matches! it loads into a black screen! which you then cant click on anything as it doesn't allow you to. causing you to leave lobby! MAKING you lose LP! that's not the worse part! then saying you abandoned the queue/game too many times you have incurred time penalty, that long wait in queue thingy! 

I think that's out of order. is there no way for me to not get this punishment! when its an overall issue with the client at the movement?

replies.body:
Seconded, although I simply get kicked out of queue over and over; whatever they were trying
to accomplish by making a new client when this is what we get is beyond me. 
Yes, I read all the flowery blubbergush, but fact is the
game hates the new client and the smallest tweak seems to have the potential to make it all unplayable!
From day one, it's been inferior in any and all ways from what we had before.

Hate to rant but this really just came to a head for me.
